projects.title: Learn solo
projects.description: A site for learning to code. Sign up and login with firebase authentication. Login with Google and Github.Use react-router-dom and context api.

projects.title: Service review
projects.description: Our company focuses on quality services with honest user reviews. Currently, we are looking for a front-end web developer to build a full-stack website using React, firebase, react router, node, express, mongodb etc.

projects.title: Books'n'Things
projects.description: A site for buying and selling old books.Users can sign up as buyers and sellers.Sellers can advertise. Admin  with Dashboard. Admin can delete  buyers and sellers.Sign up and login with firebase authentication. Login with Google. Use react router dom and tanstack query.
